text:
В небольшую, но распределённую компанию, которая хоть и занимается ML & DS требуется devops. Удалённая работа, от 25 usd в час. Если интересует - пишите мне на <mailto:alexey@actionml.com|alexey@actionml.com> или сразу по скайпу связывайтесь.

```
Devops position

- Linux administration and automation Ansible, Puppet, Chef, etc.
- scripting experience Python, Bash, Ruby
- AWS, other cloud compute platforms
- VPN, Proxy’s, Loadbalancers
- basic mvn / sbt build experience
- git
- CI

We use Spark, Hadoop (mostly HDFS), HBase, Zookeeper, Cassandra, Elastic, so it would be good to have an experience with some/most of them and passion and ability to learn new technologies.

We are consulting company so we need a diverse set of skills in devops and ability to adapt and learn fast, i.e. it is necessary not only to setup some processes for our needs, but often integrate into client’s processes and just solve tasks for client’s projects

Position is remote, but high availability is must. Good english communication skills are also mandatory.
```
